author: Reportlinker
title: Contrast Media Injector Market - Global Market Research 201
text:
NEW YORK , Oct.   About contrast media injector
Contrast media injectors are medical devices used to improve and enhance the quality of images produced inside of the body. These injectors comprise chemical substances (contrast media) used in magnetic resonance imaging, medical X-ray, computed tomography, ultrasound imaging, and angiography. These devices allow the radiologists to interpret the images accurately and examine the normal and abnormal conditions of the body. Contrast media can be administered by three ways: orally, rectally, or intravenous (intra-arterial). The two most commonly used contrast media are gadolinium and iodine-containing agents.
Technavio's analysts forecast the global contrast media injector market to grow at a CAGR of 5.11% over the period 2014-2019.

Covered in this report 
In this report, Technavio covers the present scenario and growth prospects of the global contrast media injector market for 2015-2019. To calculate the market size, we consider revenue generated from the sale of injectors such as computed tomography, magnetic resonance, and angiography

Technavio's report, Global Contrast Media Injector Market 2015-2019, has been prepared based on an in-depth market analysis with inputs from industry experts. The report also presents the vendor landscape and a corresponding detailed analysis of the top vendors in the market. Also, it discusses the major drivers and challenges in the market as well as the key trends.
